dt2.6:1.1: Rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttoti?
dt2.6:1.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayutto;
dt2.6:2.1: Vedanākkhandho … saññākkhandho … saṅkhārakkhandho tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayutto;
dt2.6:2.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;
dt2.6:3.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;
dt2.6:4.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:5.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:6.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:7.1: Cakkhuviññāṇadhātu …pe… manodhātu … manoviññāṇadhātu tīhi khandhehi sampayuttā;
dt2.6:7.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:8.1: Samudayasaccaṁ … maggasaccaṁ tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:8.2: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttaṁ.
dt2.6:8.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:9.1: Nirodhasaccaṁ … cakkhundriyaṁ …pe… kāyindriyaṁ … itthindriyaṁ … purisindriyaṁ …pe… sampayuttanti?
dt2.6:9.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:10.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:11.1: Sukhindriyaṁ … dukkhindriyaṁ … somanassindriyaṁ … domanassindriyaṁ tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:11.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:12.1: Upekkhindriyaṁ tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena chahi dhātūhi sampayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:12.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:13.1: Saddhindriyaṁ … vīriyindriyaṁ … satindriyaṁ … samādhindriyaṁ … paññindriyaṁ … anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ … aññindriyaṁ … aññātāvindriyaṁ … avijjā … avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.6:13.2: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.6:13.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:14.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:15.1: Saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayutto;
dt2.6:15.2: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto.
dt2.6:15.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;
dt2.6:16.1: Phassapaccayā vedanā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.6:16.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:17.1: Vedanāpaccayā taṇhā … taṇhāpaccayā upādānaṁ … kammabhavo tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayutto;
dt2.6:17.2: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto.
dt2.6:17.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;
dt2.6:18.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi tīhi dhātūhi vippayutto.
dt2.6:19.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;
dt2.6:20.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayutto;
dt2.6:21.1: Soko … dukkhaṁ … domanassaṁ tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:21.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:22.1: Upāyāso … satipaṭṭhānaṁ … sammappadhānaṁ tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:22.2: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttaṁ.
dt2.6:22.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:23.2: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto.
dt2.6:23.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;
dt2.6:24.1: Jhānaṁ dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:24.2: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttaṁ.
dt2.6:24.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:25.1: Appamaññā … pañcindriyāni … pañca balāni … satta bojjhaṅgā … ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayutto;
dt2.6:25.2: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto.
dt2.6:25.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;
dt2.6:26.1: Phasso … cetanā … manasikāro tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayutto;
dt2.6:26.2: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto.
dt2.6:26.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;
dt2.6:27.1: Vedanā … saññā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā;
dt2.6:27.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:28.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttaṁ;
dt2.6:29.1: Adhimokkho tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena dvīhi dhātūhi sampayutto;
dt2.6:29.2: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayutto.
dt2.6:29.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayutto;
dt2.6:30.1: Kusalā dhammā … akusalā dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttāti?
dt2.6:30.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:31.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā … dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā ekena khandhena sampayuttā;
dt2.6:31.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:32.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā ekena khandhena sampayuttā;
dt2.6:32.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:33.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:34.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:35.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.6:36.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.6:37.1: Savitakkasavicārā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.6:37.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:38.1: Avitakkavicāramattā dhammā … pītisahagatā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.6:38.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:39.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.
dt2.6:40.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:41.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:42.1: Dassanena pahātabbā dhammā bhāvanāya pahātabbā dhammā … dassanena pahātabbahetukā dhammā … bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā … ācayagāmino dhammā … apacayagāmino dhammā … sekkhā dhammā … asekkhā dhammā … mahaggatā dhammā …pe… sampayuttāti?
dt2.6:42.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:43.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.6:44.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:45.1: Mahaggatārammaṇā dhammā … appamāṇārammaṇā dhammā … hīnā dhammā … micchattaniyatā dhammā … sammattaniyatā dhammā … maggārammaṇā dhammā … maggahetukā dhammā … maggādhipatino dhammā …pe… sampayuttāti?
dt2.6:45.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:46.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā. –18
dt2.6:47.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:48.1: Paccuppannārammaṇā dhammā … ajjhattārammaṇā dhammā … bahiddhārammaṇā dhammā … ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā dhammā …pe… sampayuttāti?
dt2.6:48.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:49.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:50.1: Hetū dhammā … hetū ceva sahetukā ca dhammā … hetū ceva hetusampayuttā ca dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.6:50.2: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.6:50.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:51.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:52.1: Sahetukā ceva na ca hetū dhammā … hetusampayuttā ceva na ca hetū dhammā … na hetusahetukā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.6:52.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:53.1: Appaccayā dhammā … asaṅkhatā dhammā … sanidassanā dhammā … sappaṭighā dhammā … rūpino dhammā …pe… sampayuttāti?
dt2.6:53.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:54.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.6:55.1: Āsavā dhammā … āsavā ceva sāsavā ca dhammā … āsavā ceva āsavasampayuttā ca dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.6:55.2: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.6:55.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:56.1: Anāsavā dhammā … āsavavippayuttā anāsavā dhammā …pe… sampayuttāti?
dt2.6:56.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.6:57.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:58.1: Āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.6:58.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:59.1: Saṁyojanā dhammā … ganthā dhammā … oghā dhammā … yogā dhammā … nīvaraṇā dhammā … parāmāsā dhammā … parāmāsā ceva parāmaṭṭhā ca dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.6:59.2: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.6:59.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:60.1: Aparāmaṭṭhā dhammā … parāmāsavippayuttā aparāmaṭṭhā dhammā sampayuttāti?
dt2.6:60.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.6:61.1: Parāmāsasampayuttā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.6:61.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:62.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:63.1: Anārammaṇā dhammā … cittavippayuttā dhammā … cittavisaṁsaṭṭhā dhammā … upādā dhammā …pe… sampayuttāti?
dt2.6:63.4: Catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:64.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:65.1: Cetasikā dhammā … cittasampayuttā dhammā … cittasaṁsaṭṭhā dhammā … cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānā dhammā … cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuno dhammā … cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattino dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayuttā.
dt2.6:65.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi dasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:66.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi pañcahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.6:67.1: Upādānā dhammā … kilesā dhammā … kilesā ceva saṅkilesikā ca dhammā … kilesā ceva saṅkiliṭṭhā ca dhammā … kilesā ceva kilesasampayuttā ca dhammā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā sampayuttā;
dt2.6:67.2: ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.6:67.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:68.1: Asaṅkilesikā dhammā … kilesavippayuttā asaṅkilesikā dhammā …pe… sampayuttāti?
dt2.6:68.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.6:69.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:70.1: Saṅkiliṭṭhā ceva no ca kilesā dhammā … kilesasampayuttā ceva no ca kilesā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.6:70.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:71.1: Dassanena pahātabbā dhammā … bhāvanāya pahātabbā dhammā … dassanena pahātabbahetukā dhammā … bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukā dhammā … sampayuttāti?
dt2.6:71.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:72.1: Savitakkā dhammā … savicārā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.6:72.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:73.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā.
dt2.6:74.1: Sappītikā dhammā … pītisahagatā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā.
dt2.6:74.3: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:75.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi pannarasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:76.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi ekādasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
dt2.6:77.1: Na kāmāvacarā dhammā … apariyāpannā dhammā … anuttarā dhammā …pe… sampayuttāti?
dt2.6:77.4: Na kehici khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi chahi dhātūhi vippayuttā.
dt2.6:78.1: Rūpāvacarā dhammā … arūpāvacarā dhammā … niyyānikā dhammā … niyatā dhammā … saraṇā dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi sampayuttāti?
dt2.6:78.4: Ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayuttā;
